content: I'll be catching a flight so might not make tomorrow's meeting, should be fine though

Meeting 2021-11-30T16:00:00Z

Agenda:

  • Use new template forms for issue templates clippy#8032
  • Missed sync + release
  • ...?
Meeting in t-15 min
:wave:
I like the new template forms.
Whoops, missed the start of the meeting
Hey all :wave:
Yeah, I just wanted to bring the new template form to your attention.
The main topic today is the missed sync last week and the release
Whoa.
The missed sync was a bit unlucky with RLS blocking us
But I don't think we missed anything important for this release?
ah so it was a bad combination of clippy-sync and no-tool-breakage week?
Rather a unlucky situation where Clippy broke RLS, which almost never happens
But this time right before a release in the no-tool-breakage week, yeah
Igor said that they will return from their PTO in December, so we might get the sync in on time this Thursday
But since it is release week, it's also CHANGELOG time. As always it would be really great if someone could write the CHANGELOG (doesn't have to be until Thursday)
It should be shorter this time, because of the missed sync :D
does it make sense for clippy folks to also get access to rls so they can merge "fixes" like this in case of emergencies?
Not sure. I think the challenge here is, that Igor is the last remaining maintainer of RLS. So if they are on vacation or takes time off, it doesn't move forward
I definitely DON'T want to blame Igor here !
But that's it from me. Other topics you want to discuss @triagebot end-meeting

Does anyone have something to bring up?
React with :working_on_it: if you have something to say.
React with :all_good: if you're ready to end the meeting.
Have a good time, folks!
Ok then, thanks for attending! :wave:
